Package src

Class Election

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.Election
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CPL, OPL
    public class Election
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the parent class to both the CPL and OPL class. It has the methods required to run both types of elections.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void allocateSeats()
      Allocate seats to each party.
      void auditFile()
      Calls the Audit class to create an audit file.
      int calculateQuota()
      Calculates the quota which is the floor of the total number of votes divided by the total number of seats.
      Party coinToss​(java.util.ArrayList<Party> winners)
      Simulates a fair coin toss to break a tie between a list of parties.
      void displayResults()
      Calls the Display class to display the results of the election.
      void findWinners()
      Finds the winner based on the party with the most seats.
      void voteCounting()
      Counts the votes for each party.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Election

        public Election​(int totalVotes,
                int totalSeats,
                java.util.ArrayList<Party> parties,
                java.io.BufferedReader br)
        Initializes the variables of the Election class.
        Parameters:
        totalVotes - total number of votes in election
        totalSeats - total number of seats in election
        parties - a list of parties in election
        br - buffered reader to continue reading the given ballot file

    • Method Detail

      • calculateQuota

        public int calculateQuota()
        Calculates the quota which is the floor of the total number of votes divided by the total number of seats.
        Returns:
        quota return the quota value after calculate it

      • voteCounting

        public void voteCounting()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Counts the votes for each party. This will not work if the total number of votes is less than or equal to 0.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading the ballot file

      • coinToss

        public Party coinToss​(java.util.ArrayList<Party> winners)
        Simulates a fair coin toss to break a tie between a list of parties.
        Parameters:
        winners - a list of election winners
        Returns:
        The randomly chosen index of winner

      • allocateSeats

        public void allocateSeats()
        Allocate seats to each party.

      • findWinners

        public void findWinners()
        Finds the winner based on the party with the most seats.

      • displayResults

        public void displayResults()
        Calls the Display class to display the results of the election.

      • auditFile

        public void auditFile()
        Calls the Audit class to create an audit file.
